abstract: Why is Bank of America‘s stock rising today? While $34 billion is a big number, some on Wall Street thought its capital shortfall would be twice as large.
snippet: Why is Bank of America‘s stock rising today? While $34 billion is a big number, some on Wall Street thought its capital shortfall would be twice as large.
lead_paragraph: In normal times, news that a company needed $34 billion in extra capital would be disastrous. Yet shares of Bank of America were on the upswing Wednesday morning after reports that regulators wanted the company to increase its capital by that amount, to cushion against more economic shocks.

headline.main: For BofA, It Could Have Been Worse
